entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 16.6Â°C

Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 8.
